name: JUSDICE
description:
111% New Game, JUSDICE!!
Block the enemies by placing your dice.
There are dices with special ability such as Explosion, Lightning, and Slow.
Upgrade and combine placed dice.
Use the more powerful dice.
You`ll be able to stop all the enemies that appear! How far have you done!!!!!
Simple but Addictive.
JUSDICE by 111%
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Features:
- You can place 6 dices at the board
- If you defence the enemy more than 500, you are a excellent defencer.
- Challenge your friends with GameCenter support.
- Check our facebook page, 111%, to play other addictive games.
- Simple UI, Fun Animation effects, Colorful Dices.
BBTAN, CCTAN, DDTAN, EETAN, POPONG!, Charles, CtrlCV, Goodnight RUDY, RoadStar, Lunar Blade, DjJelly, PushKey, Boing111, JUMP360, 1655m, BBTOON, ActionFingers and JUSDICE.
Share your screenshots online SNS such as Facebook, Instagram or Snapchat.
Enjoy addictive JUSDICE while you commute, on a date, in the bus or subway, waiting at the bank and so on. Anytime, anywhere you can play addictive JUSDICE!!!!
